channel.title: [pointproven] Square from notepad. [/PP]
channel.description:
alright so this guy from minecraft said that modeling from notepad is Impossible so im posting one here... although... it can only be used to make doom like grapgics from the... well where ever console it started from. here it is... dont flame.. becuase the code is here to do it [code] }
EnableZYX:
ZYX = 20, -40, 10, 0; //Square
EnableTEXtureZYX:
TEXtureZYX: 0000000, 0000000, 0000000, 0000000; //Color black
EnableVpoint:
Vpoint = 5, 15, -25, 10; // puts a Vpoint (vector point) at the middle of each line
EnableFill:
Fill = FFFFFFF+20, FFFFFFF+-40, FFFFFF+10, FFFFFFF+0; // fills in the area
{[/code]
this code is then put in a home made program i made at school :P im sure you guys can make it if my teacher knows so i wont release to program to make it.
then it turns out like this
{note}: i couldent figure out how to put a wireframe into my program... so theres no wireframe. also second note, this is Fake3d. wich means each side of the thing will have to have its own model... with a code like
EnableArea: area = 1+y //north 0, south 1, east 2, west 3 if you wanted it to be rotated at a point youw ould use decimals like 0.20 or something lol... lots of time. i got an A+ for it :P
[img]http://img863.imageshack.us/img863/5047/square.png[/img]
well anyway... just comment dont rate.

[quote=“I Vain I”]He renders his with Notepad.

Besides, nobody can render yours unless they know what format that is in, or a program capable of rendering it.[/quote]

item.title: [pointproven] Square from notepad. [/PP]
item.dc:creator: @mironic mironic
item.description:
@mironic wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]What’s the point of releasing code when nobody can use it?

Anyone can draw a square with text, instead of a Visual program.

var MySquare:Shape = new Shape; MySquare.graphics.beginFill(0xFF0000); MySquare.graphics.drawRect(0, 0, 100,100); MySquare.graphics.endFill(); addChild(MySquare);

[PHP]<?php
header (“Content-type: image/png”);

 $MySquare = ImageCreate(150, 150);
 $grey = ImageColorAllocate($MySquare, 230, 230, 230);
 $black = ImageColorAllocate($MySquare, 0, 0, 0);

 ImageRectangle($MySquare, 40, 40, 40, 40, $black);
 ImageString($MySquare, 3, 5, 5, "MySquare", $black);
 ImagePng ($MySquare);
 ImageDestroy ($MySquare);

?>[/PHP]

etc.[/quote]

i know it was a point. lol… becuase if you read my post… its a point… lol trying to prove to a guy that said it was impossible XD

Read full topic

item.title: [pointproven] Square from notepad. [/PP]
item.dc:creator: @mironic mironic
item.description:
@mironic wrote:

alright so this guy from minecraft said that modeling from notepad is Impossible so im posting one here… although… it can only be used to make doom like grapgics from the… well where ever console it started from. here it is… dont flame… becuase the code is here to do it

[code] }

EnableZYX:

ZYX = 20, -40, 10, 0; //Square

EnableTEXtureZYX:

TEXtureZYX: 0000000, 0000000, 0000000, 0000000; //Color black

EnableVpoint:

Vpoint = 5, 15, -25, 10; // puts a Vpoint (vector point) at the middle of each line

EnableFill:

Fill = FFFFFFF+20, FFFFFFF±40, FFFFFF+10, FFFFFFF+0; // fills in the area

{[/code]

this code is then put in a home made program i made at school im sure you guys can make it if my teacher knows so i wont release to program to make it.

then it turns out like this

{note}: i couldent figure out how to put a wireframe into my program… so theres no wireframe. also second note, this is Fake3d. wich means each side of the thing will have to have its own model… with a code like

EnableArea:
area = 1+y //north 0, south 1, east 2, west 3 if you wanted it to be rotated at a point youw ould use decimals like 0.20 or something lol… lots of time. i got an A+ for it

well anyway… just comment dont rate.
